ComicInfo.Penciller: Francesco Manna,Juan Antonio Ramirez,Juanfrancisco Moyano,Larry Watts,Matthew Childers
ComicInfo.Summary:
With Ash getting hitched and the army of darkness continuously at the heels of the Chosen One, it's time to party like it's 1992... point one! Dynamite celebrates the success of the Army of Darkness series by going back to a simpler time - when the internet was young and cell phones were ten pounds. This one-shot features stories that are classically Ash, by your favorite Army of Darkness Writers: James Kuhoric, Steve Niles, Elliott Serrano, and Mike Raicht. Not to mention your soon-to-be new favorite, Cullen Bun - with a story that ties directly into the new story arc!
*Story Titles* Promotion Commotion Rockwellicon Ash Beyond Return To the Windmill Prelude To Ash In Space *List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|--------------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Lucio Parrillo | 1 | | Sub | Subscription Cover | Roberto Castro & Alex Guimaraes | 2 |
*Notes:* The Regular Cover is a homage of the movie poster for Army of Darkness. The Subscription Cover is a homage of the Death Dealer.
ComicInfo.Writer: Cullen Bunn,Elliott R. Serrano,James Kuhoric,Mike Raicht,Steve Niles
